name: Gandalf, White Rider
description: He has passed through the fire and the abyss, and the enemy shall fear him.

abilities.name: Vigilance
abilities.description: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Scry 1.

effects.name: Death
effects.description: When Gandalf dies, you may put it into its owner's library fifth from the top.

set.name: The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle Earth
